about_the_game:
Jans Tokenpack 17 - Greek Myth Monsters

Greek Mythology has hugely inspired the classic roleplaying game adventures. Those stories feature awesome monsters and creatures. You can now relive the classic myths, and create your own heroic tales.
This pack includes:
  • Blemy - Headless creatures with a face on their chest
  • Living statue - bronze, gold, and marble
  • Centaur - Male and female varriants with bow or spear
  • Cerberus - The three headed dog that guards the underworld
  • Chimera - A winged creature with three heads
  • Cyplops - One eyed giants
  • Echidna - Half Snake/Half Woman
  • Harpy - Winged women with sharp claws
  • Hoplite Skeleton - With bow, sword, or spear
  • Hydra - Wingless dragons with multiple heads
  • Manticore - A flying lion, with a human face
  • Medusa - The snake haired woman whos gaze can turn you to stone
  • Minotaur - Half man, half bull
  • Satyr - Horned men with goat legs carrying a flute, bow, or sword
  • Sphinx - A winged creature that is half lion, half woman
Converted by:   Jan Loos

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
